ErrorFirstName: First Name is required for all children.
ErrorLastName: Last Name is required for all children.
LabelHasAllergy: Does the child have an allergy?
HelpHasAllergy: If the child is allergic to something. Selecting 'Yes' will allow you to enter what the allergy is.
HelpAllergy: The item(s) this child is allergic to.
ErrorGender: Gender is required for all children.
ErrorBirthDate: Birth Date is required for all children.
ErrorGrade: Grade is required for all children.
ErrorMobilePhone: A valid phone number is required for all children.
ErrorSMS: SMS Number is required if SMS communication preference is selected.
ErrorAdultName: The name of at least one adult needs to be entered.
ErrorAdultFullName: A First and Last name is required for each person.
ErrorAdultGender: Gender is required for each adult.
ErrorAdultBirthdate: Birthdate is required for each adult.
ErrorAdultEmail: Email is required for each adult.
ErrorAdultPhone: Mobile Phone is required for each adult.
ErrorAllergy: Each child must have their allergy field filled out if they have an allergy.
